file.title: Image

p.text: It is an image which locates on the object. It is behind a text, but over a background image.

p.textAll: Image is specified by setting path to the file of this image.

remarks.text: The path to the image can be set as absolute, i.e. it starts with the drive letter:
or it can be relative and starts from the folder of your project:

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how a main window image can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Window1.Image = "C:/1.bmp" Window1.Window1.Image = "/1.bmp" Window1.Window1.Image = My documents & "/2.jpg" Window1.Window1.Image = Window1.Button1.Background image
